DOC.brief_summary: Rosuvastatin reload may prevent myocardial damage ACS patient undergo PCI
DOC.brief_title: Acute Rosuvastatin Preventing Myocardial Damage Patients With ACS
DOC.criteria: 1875 year old diagnose acute coronary syndrome Plan PCI STEMI patient emergency PCI ( < 2h ) NSTEACS History liver disease myopathy ( ALT/AST > 3 x upper limit normal , CK > 5 x upper limit normal ) TG > 500mg/dl , CCr < 30ml/min inflammatory disease allergic rosuvastatin nephrotic syndrome , hypothyroidism , systemic lupus erythematosus , myeloma , et.al .
